problem.problem_statement: How can having a variety of plants help us fight malnutrition?
problem.goalTitle: Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages

problem.problem_statement: What are the best ways to fish without harming the environment?
problem.goalTitle: Conserve and sustainably use the oceans, seas and marine resources for sustainable development

problem.problem_statement: How can using fire-resistant materials reduce wildfire damage?
problem.goalTitle: Make cities and human settlements inclusive, safe, resilient and sustainable

problem.problem_statement: How can we bring back forests that have been damaged?
problem.goalTitle: Protect, restore and promote sustainable use of terrestrial ecosystems, sustainably manage forests, combat desertification, and halt and reverse land degradation and halt biodiversity loss

problem.problem_statement: How can we control invasive plants to help native bees?
problem.goalTitle: Protect, restore and promote sustainable use of terrestrial ecosystems, sustainably manage forests, combat desertification, and halt and reverse land degradation and halt biodiversity loss
